name: Marty's Pooch Date
description:
A young- yet mature- gentledog named Marty starts taking his journey of love seriously and it's up to you to help him find his true love! Join Marty in this story by guiding him to the best date he could ever have!

(TIP: Adjust your browser size to fit the entire screen by zooming in or out, depending on your screen's size... and don't transfer between displays of different sizes as it'll ruin the layout of some scenes haha. Regardless of what happens I hope you enjoy and thank you for choosing my simple story to play✨)
